name: Enlightened Master
description: Monks who have achieved spiritual enlightenment and use their abilities to protect and guide others, bringing harmony to the world through wisdom and compassion.

resource_systems.name: Ki
resource_systems.description: Inner spiritual energy that powers martial techniques and supernatural abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per 6 seconds, +3 per successful melee attack combo finisher
mechanics: Ki points are spent to activate special abilities and techniques
Some abilities require maintaining a ki flow, consuming points over time
Meditation stance increases ki regeneration rate by 500% but prevents movement
Can channel ki to allies to restore their resources

resource_systems.name: Focus
resource_systems.description: Mental concentration that enhances precision and power of techniques
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds during combat, decays when out of combat
mechanics: Increases by 10 when landing attacks, 20 for critical hits
Decreases by 1 per second when not in combat
Higher Focus increases critical hit chance and damage of special techniques
At 150+ Focus, gain access to Divine techniques

resource_systems.name: Harmony
resource_systems.description: Balance between physical prowess and spiritual enlightenment
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds by alternating between offensive and defensive actions
mechanics: Increases by 15 when switching from attack to defense or vice versa
Decreases by 3 per 10 seconds
Higher Harmony increases all damage and damage reduction
At maximum Harmony, can enter Enlightened State for 45 seconds

resource_systems.name: Divine Light
resource_systems.description: Spiritual energy of pure goodness that heals and protects
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when healing or protecting allies
mechanics: Increases by 10 when healing an ally
Increases by 5 when preventing damage to an ally
Decreases by 2 per 10 seconds
Can be spent to enhance healing abilities or create protective barriers

class_mechanics.name: Enlightened Combat
class_mechanics.description: Perfect harmony of mind, body, and spirit in battle
effects: Unarmed attacks deal 3d8 base damage (increases with level)
Attack speed with unarmed strikes is 40% faster than standard weapons
Critical hits with unarmed attacks have a 50% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds
Attacks can cleanse negative effects from allies or apply positive effects

class_mechanics.name: Path of Light
class_mechanics.description: Channel divine energy through martial techniques
effects: Attacks can be imbued with holy energy that deals additional damage to evil creatures
Can create zones of purification that heal allies and damage undead
Immune to corruption and negative energy effects
Presence reduces the power of evil abilities within 30 meters

class_mechanics.name: Spiritual Guidance
class_mechanics.description: Ability to guide and enhance the spiritual energy of allies
effects: Can transfer ki to allies to restore their resources
Nearby allies gain 20% increased resource regeneration
Can cleanse debuffs and negative status effects from allies
Group meditation provides powerful buffs to all participants

class_mechanics.name: Transcendent Wisdom
class_mechanics.description: Perfect understanding of the universe and its workings
effects: Can see the true nature of all beings and objects
Immune to illusions and deception
Can predict enemy actions with 80% accuracy
Wisdom-based insights provide tactical advantages in combat

signature_abilities.name: Enlightenment Aura
signature_abilities.description: Project an aura of spiritual enlightenment that enhances allies and weakens enemies
mechanics: Creates a 30-meter aura centered on the Enlightened Master
Allies within the aura gain 30% increased damage, 20% damage reduction, and immunity to mind control
Enemies within the aura suffer 15% reduced damage, 10% increased damage taken, and reduced movement speed
Costs 30 Ki to activate and 5 Ki per 10 seconds to maintain

signature_abilities.name: Thousand Lotus Palm
signature_abilities.description: Channel divine energy into a devastating series of strikes that heal allies and damage enemies
mechanics: Unleash 1000 strikes in a 10-meter radius around the Enlightened Master
Each strike deals 50% weapon damage to enemies and heals allies for 5% of their maximum health
Cleanses all negative effects from allies and applies negative effects to enemies based on their vulnerabilities
Costs 50 Ki and 100 Divine Light

signature_abilities.name: Transcendent Form
signature_abilities.description: Temporarily ascend to a higher plane of existence, becoming a being of pure spiritual energy
mechanics: Transform into a being of pure light for 30 seconds
Gain immunity to all damage and negative effects
Movement speed increased by 100%
All abilities cost no resources and have no cooldown
Costs 100 Ki, 200 Focus, and 150 Harmony

skill_trees.name: Way of the Healer
key_abilities: Healing Touch: Channel ki to heal allies for 50% of their maximum health
Purifying Palm: Remove all negative effects from an ally
Circle of Protection: Create a barrier that absorbs damage for allies

skill_trees.name: Way of the Enlightened
key_abilities: Divine Insight: Gain perfect knowledge of enemy weaknesses
Mind Over Matter: Temporarily transcend physical limitations
Spiritual Projection: Project consciousness across vast distances

skill_trees.name: Way of the Light
key_abilities: Divine Strike: Channel holy energy into a devastating attack
Banish Darkness: Remove all undead and demonic entities in an area
Beacon of Hope: Create a pillar of light that continuously heals allies

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Way of the Ascendant skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Good alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Defeat the Dark Master without dealing direct damage

legendary_items.name: Gloves of Divine Light
effects: Attacks heal nearby allies for 10% of damage dealt
Increases healing done by 30%
Divine Light regeneration increased by 50%

legendary_items.name: Halo of Transcendence
effects: Wisdom increased by 5
All enemies within 20 meters take 10% more damage
Transcendent Form duration increased by 15 seconds

legendary_items.name: Robes of the Celestial Buddha
effects: Reduces all damage taken by 25%
Automatically reflects 30% of damage back to attackers
Enlightenment Aura radius increased by 15 meters

lore: Enlightened Masters represent the pinnacle of spiritual achievement among monks. They have transcended the limitations of mortal existence, achieving a state of perfect harmony with the universe. Their understanding of ki and spiritual energy allows them to perform miraculous feats of healing and protection, while their martial prowess makes them formidable opponents against the forces of darkness. Enlightened Masters often serve as spiritual leaders, guiding others on the path to enlightenment and using their abilities to protect the innocent from harm. They are revered throughout the world for their wisdom, compassion, and incredible abilities, serving as beacons of hope in troubled times.
